faq_one.question: Do I have to be an Executive to get an invite?
faq_one.answer: Not at all! while executives are likely to see the largest and fastest impact of implementing Itramei within their organizations, anyone in roles that rely on effective communication—such as Leaders, Sales Professionals, Lawyers, Consultants, and more—will likely experience noticeable improvements. We welcome everyone to apply and be part of the future of effective communication.

faq_two.question: Can I preorder Itramei licenses to have them configured by the time of the launch?
faq_two.answer: Yes, we offer presale options to ensure that Itramei is tailored to your needs by launch day. If you're interested in making sure your organization is ready to maximize its potential, contact us at presales@itramei.com for exclusive early access.

faq_three.question: How much does it cost to preorder?
faq_three.answer: There’s no upfront cost! You won't pay anything until the product is launched and delivered. Our preordering agreement allows us to allocate the necessary resources to tailor Itramei specifically to your business needs—ensuring a smooth and impactful rollout from day one. Contact presales@itramei.com for more.

faq_four.question: Do I have to be a business to purchase an Itramei subscription?
faq_four.answer: Itramei is designed for everyone! While businesses have the option to preorder and unlock deeper functionalities, both business and individual subscriptions will be available at launch, giving everyone the opportunity to benefit from the platform.

faq_five.question: What is the price point?
faq_five.answer: This will be announced soon - stay tuned for details!

faq_six.question: Will I benefit by preordering?
faq_six.answer: Definitely! As a token of appreciation for your early commitment, you will have access to exclusive pricing. If you're ready to secure your spot and enjoy the benefits of preordering, contact presales@itramei.com.

faq_seven.question: How do I take part in Itramei’s investment offer?
faq_seven.answer: To learn more and explore how you can get involved, simply reach out to us at investment@itramei.com. We look forward to discussing how you can be part of Itramei’s growth!

faq_eight.question: What’s the difference between the product and event waiting lists?
faq_eight.answer: The event waiting list is your gateway to an in-person experience in Dublin. Meet the team behind Itramei, network, and get a firsthand look at how the platform will revolutionize communication in your organization. The product launch waiting list, on the other hand, gives you early access to Itramei, along with important updates and announcements. Why not join both and be fully immersed?

faq_nine.question: Does signing up for one waitlist register me for both?
faq_nine.answer: Signing up for the launch event will automatically enroll you in the Itramei waitlist. However, if you cannot attend in person in Dublin, we recommend signing up only for the Itramei waitlist.

faq_ten.question: When is the Launch?
faq_ten.answer: The launch is planned for around March / April, with exact dates to be confirmed.
